about.title: Full Stack Developer
about.description: I create elegant solutions to complex problems, specializing in modern web development with a focus on user experience and clean code. I write code and teach at <CustomComponent01>{{name}}</CustomComponent01>, a software boot camp for underrepresented people. Below you will find some of my Projects. When I am not coding I am working on my next presentation or mentoring; both of which push me to learn and grow.
about.description01: I am a bilingual fullstack software developer. I create elegant solutions to complex problems; specializing in modern web development with a focus on accessibility and user experience. I write code and teach at Code the Dream, a software boot camp for underrepresented people. Below you will find some highlighted projects. Most of my repos are open to collaborators. Please consider contributing! As always, I am open to new work opportunities.
about.description02: When I am not working I am preparing for my next presentation, mentoring, or hosting monthly algorithmic problem solving sessions; all of which push me to learn and grow.
about.description03: The problem solving sessions are open to everyone. See ... for more info. Connect with me on social media below.
about.description04: Connect with me on social media below.

first.title: Portfolio Website
first.description: This is where I share a bit about myself, showcase what I've been working on, and share where you can find me online. It is build with a React, Vite and TypeScript front end. I am re-writing the Node Express backend.
first.description00: This portfolio, available in both Spanish and English, highlights a bit about myself, showcases what I’ve been working on, and shares where to engage with me online. It is built with an accessibility-first approach, following WCAG standards, the i18next translation library, and using a modern tech stack of React 19, TypeScript, and Vite 6. And it is fully responsive working seamlessly across all devices, includes smooth animations via Framer Motion, and optimized performance through code splitting, lazy loading, and compression. Future features include adding code testing, a contact form and a searchable and filterable blog and resource pages.
first.description01: This portfolio, available in both Spanish and English, highlights a bit about myself, showcases what I’ve been working on, and shares where to engage with me online.
first.description02: It is built with an accessibility-first approach, following WCAG standards, the i18next translation library, and using a modern tech stack of React 19, TypeScript, and Vite 6.
first.description03: And it is fully responsive working seamlessly across all devices, includes smooth animations via Framer Motion, and optimized performance through code splitting, lazy loading, and compression.
first.description04: Future features include adding code testing, a contact form and a searchable and filterable blog and resource pages.

second.title: Personal Dashboard
second.description: A website for displaying and analyzing important daily data. Such as blood glucose numbers and upcoming events. Using Svelt TypeScript front end and Java backend. Which database is yet to be seen. It will use authentication.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I'm always interested in hearing about new projects and opportunities. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out!
contact.description01: I’m always interested in hearing about new projects and opportunities. If you have a question or just want to say hello, please get in touch via email or social media.
contact.description020: I’m always interested in hearing about new projects and opportunities. Have something to share or discuss? Send an email or follow me on social media.
contact.description021: I’m always interested in hearing about new projects and opportunities.
